basics.summary: To secure a full time Combustion Engineer position applying strong fundamentals for application, research, and development in the areas of Combustion and Fluids and Thermal Sciences and other allied Mechanical Engineering related functions

work.summary: Familiarized with & utilized ASME Engineering Design, Drafting & Documentation Standards Provided support to the engineering team in developing conceptual layout drawings and performed various engineering studies to obtain the simplest and the most efficient engineering solution for Pressure Vessel design and piping design and specification Developed drawings, schematics and P&ID's using AutoCAD Mechanical and Microstation according to ANSI Document Control & Management System for electronic as well as hard copy documents - Coordinated the organizing, scanning, retrieval and distribution of engineering documents for Project Managers.
